titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to establish special rules relating to which professional sports leagues qualify to be exempt from taxation.
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to establish special rules relating to which professional sports leagues qualify to be exempt from taxation.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: This bill denies tax-exempt status to certain professional sports leagues with gross receipts exceeding $1 billion during any of the five preceding taxable years.
